channel.title: Intro on Diary of a FLL Coach
channel.description: Recent content in Intro on Diary of a FLL Coach

item.title: Starting the Journey
item.description: Intro I’ve taken the dive to be a First Lego League coach. Why, you may ask would I put myself through this? Well, there are a couple of reasons that drove me to it. I’ve been wanting to do projects with my son that involved building with your hands. And I’m always looking for opportunities to improve my leadership skills. I will be documenting my journey this year through this blog.
